meanings.definition: Consisting of two parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The car had duals exhaust pipes.
meanings.sent2: The headphones had duals speakers for better sound quality.
meanings.sent3: The duals colors of the rainbow made a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: Her duals interests in art and science made her a unique student.
meanings.sent5: The duals flavors of the ice cream were a delightful surprise.

meanings.sent1: The twins were like duals, always together.
meanings.sent2: The gloves were sold as duals to keep both hands warm.
meanings.sent3: The duals of shoes were neatly placed by the door.
meanings.sent4: The duals of earrings sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The duals of keys jingled in her pocket.

meanings.definition: A person having two roles or functions
meanings.sent1: As a teacher and a coach, he was a duals in the school.
meanings.sent2: She juggled her roles as a mother and a business owner, a true duals.
meanings.sent3: The duals of being a student and a part-time worker kept her busy.
meanings.sent4: He was a duals, both the chef and the waiter at the restaurant.
meanings.sent5: The duals of being a friend and a mentor made her a valuable companion.
